name: starter-app-webstack
description: Full-stack starter with PostgreSQL, Express, React, and Docker

scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix backend && npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix backend && npm run format:check --prefix frontend
